title: I love this hotel
text: I stay at a lot of hotels in NY, and I have stayed at the Pierre several times over the past 20 years. This month I went for the first time since it became a Taj. This is my new favorite hotel. It may be the awesome Upper East Side meets midtown location - Central Park literally right outside, along with a 24 hour Apple Store. It may be the classics - elevator operators, old school accents. The incredible food everywhere - room service, Perrine. A better shoe shine than I get at home, every night. This is the perfect NYC business hotel.
